channel.title: dewiweb – Ember+
channel.description: Recent content in Ember+ on dewiweb

item.title: emberplus_rust
item.description:
Overview

A Rust implementation of the Ember+ protocol, covering both the client (consumer) and server (provider) roles.

Ember+ is a control protocol used in the broadcast and audiovisual industry for communication between equipment (mixers, routers, monitoring systems…).

Features

  • Ember+ client (consumer) implementation
  • Ember+ server (provider) implementation
  • Written in Rust (performance, memory safety)

Why Rust?

Rust provides excellent memory-safety guarantees and performance for a low-level protocol like Ember+, which requires reliable, low-latency communication.

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: Rust

item.title: Control protocols
item.description:
ember-plus

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ember-plus

The official Ember+ protocol from Lawo — an open control protocol for the broadcast and audiovisual industry. Used to communicate between broadcast equipment (mixers, routers, monitoring systems).

  • Language: C++
  • Licence: BSL-1.0
  • Original project

ember-plus-sharp

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ember-plus-sharp

Ember+ implementation for .NET, enabling the rapid creation of fully-typed Ember+ consumers in any .NET language.

  • Language: C#
  • Licence: BSL-1.0
  • Documentation

OSCRouter

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/OSCRouter

Simple UDP/TCP packet router for Mac and Windows with OSC-specific options. Redistributes OSC messages between multiple applications or devices.

  • Language: C++
  • Licence: MIT

item.title: MCxOSC
item.description:
Overview

A bridge between the Ember+ and OSC protocols, specifically designed for Lawo MCx consoles. Allows controlling and monitoring an MCx console from any OSC environment (Chataigne, Max/MSP, QLab, etc.).

Features

  • Bidirectional Ember+ ↔ OSC translation
  • Adapted to Lawo MCx console specifics
  • Interfacing with show control systems via OSC

Status

⭐ 6 stars · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript

item.title: MCxOSCnext
item.description:
Overview

A rewrite and evolution of MCxOSC — an Ember+ to OSC bridge. Revised architecture for greater robustness and flexibility, compatible with a wider range of Ember+ equipment.

Features

  • Ember+ ↔ OSC bridge with improved architecture
  • Better error handling and automatic reconnection
  • Compatible with any Ember+ device, not only Lawo MCx

Status

⭐ 4 stars · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript

item.title: Broadcast & media
item.description:
sofie-emberplus-connection

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/sofie-emberplus-connection

Ember+ connection layer for Sofie — the modern TV news studio automation system. TypeScript Ember+ communication layer.

  • Language: TypeScript

pi-list

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/pi-list

Live IP Software Toolkit from the EBU to assist in implementing IP facilities (ST2110, AES67). Analysis and monitoring tool for IP media streams.

  • Language: C++

media-network-manager-cloud

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/media-network-manager-cloud

MnMs — set of tools for monitoring and administering real-time media networks (ST2110, AES67, Dante…).

ear-production-suite

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ear-production-suite

VST plugin suite for producing and reproducing immersive and personalisable audio, based on the Audio Definition Model (ADM) and ITU renderer.

  • ⭐ 1 star

pam

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/pam

Audio Monitoring Software designed to run on a Raspberry Pi with touchscreen.

  • ⭐ 1 star · Language: C++

BM-Camera-Control-WebUI

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/BM-Camera-Control-WebUI

Extensible web interface for Blackmagic camera control.

  • Language: JavaScript
